snippet: The revelation on Saturday that President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner suffered a head injury seven weeks ago has fueled questions about the government’s actions.
abstract: Revelation that Argentina's Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner suffered head injury seven weeks earlier is fueling questions about government's handling of information regarding her health.

byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and JONATHAN GILBERT

lead_paragraph: The revelation on Saturday that President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner suffered a head injury seven weeks ago has fueled questions about the government’s actions.

headline.main: News of Argentine President’s Latest Ailment Fuels Criticism and Speculation
headline.print_headline: News of Argentine President’s Latest Ailment Fuels Criticism and Speculation
